home-banner.copy-trades: Earn interest with your favorite Social Trader Sets.

home-header.title: Crypto Portfolios From The
home-header.description: Join thousands of other users who automate the best portfolio management strategies with TokenSets.

home-social-trader.title: Set Social Trader
home-social-trader.description: Follow the best traders with a click of a button or create your own sets and gather your following.

home-why-section.title: How It Works
home-why-section.description: Set portfolios automatically rebalance your crypto using the strategy you choose. Reduce your emotional risk from actively trading by letting the portfolio strategies do the work for you.

home-v2-section.title: Say Hello To
home-v2-section.audited-description: The Set V2 system has been audited by industry leading auditing firms Open Zeppelin and ABDK.
home-v2-section.portfolios-description: Portfolios can hold multiple assets and change their positions based on the portfolio's strategy.
home-v2-section.yield-farming-description: Generate yield simply by joining a portfolio. Choose from a range of different yield farming strategies from low risk low reward, to high risk high reward.

home-one-token-section.title: Smart Rebalancing
home-one-token-section.description: Upgrade your existing crypto into a Set that follows a strategy of your choice. Each Set is fully backed by the crypto asset that it’s managing.

home-set-explanation.title: Peace of Mind
home-set-explanation.audited-code: Powered by audited code. No counterparty risk. You control your funds.
home-set-explanation.no-lockup: Freely buy and sell Sets on TokenSets. There are no lockup periods after purchasing a Set.
home-set-explanation.portfolio: Each Set acts like a tokenized portfolio, containing the underlying tokens belonging to that Set.

home-integrations.title: You Already Use
home-integrations.description: Use 3rd party wallets you're already familiar with on TokenSets, or sign up with email and password.

home-explore-section.get-started-description: View Sets that are available to buy and sell. Load your wallet with crypto and get started joining portfolio strategies on TokenSets.
home-explore-section.portfolio-managers-description: Create a Set as a portfolio manager and get your users to easily join your portfolio strategies.
